reference.notes:
Elements References -------- ---------- Y Zr Nb Mo Tc Rh Pd: J. Grant Hill and James A. Platts, Auxiliary Basis Sets for Density-Fitted MP2 Calculations: Correlation-Consistent Basis Sets for the 4d Elements, J. Chem. Theory Comput. 5, 500 (2009).
Hf Ta W Re Os Ir Pt: J. Grant Hill, Auxiliary basis sets for density fitting second-order Møller-Plesset perturbation theory: Correlation consistent basis sets for the 5d elements Hf-Pt, J. Chem. Phys. 135, 044105 (2011).
